author: Opinion by Gene Seymour
title: Covid-19 is ravaging the music world
description: The coronavirus pandemic has struck an already seemingly relentless series of recent body blows to the music world, says Gene Seymour, who remembers two father figures of jazz in particular - Ellis Marsalis and Bucky Pizzarelli - and notes the pain of losing …
content: Gene Seymour is a film critic who has written about music, movies and culture for The New York Times, Newsday, Entertainment Weekly and The Washington Post. Follow him on Twitter @GeneSeymour. The opinions expressed in this commentary are solely those of the … [+5862 chars]
